text: Ludvík Vaculík (23 July 1926 – 6 June 2015) was a Czech writer and journalist. He was born in Brumov. He was a known samizdat writer. He was the most known as the author of the "Two Thousand Words" manifesto of June 1968. Vaculík died at the age of 88 on 6 June 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Website about Vaculík and his work * Two Thousand Words * How to Make a Boy - an example * Our Success Story columne, , October 2008 * Ludvík Vaculík at Czechoslovak book network Baila.net Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Czech writers Category:Czechoslovak journalists
title: Ludvík Vaculík
